thread.title: Peek behind bars: Inmate art show depicts life on death row
thread.title_full: Peek behind bars: Inmate art show depicts life on death row

title: Peek behind bars: Inmate art show depicts life on death row
text: > Pennsylvania Peek behind bars: Inmate art show depicts life on death row Ndume Olatushani stands with one of his paintings, the centerpiece of a Los Angeles exhibition titled "Windows on Death Row: Art From Inside and Outside the Prison Walls" at the University of Southern California Annenberg Shool for Communication and Journalism in Los Angeles on Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015. Featuring dozens of pieces from more than 20 artists in styles that range from oil on canvas to pencil on paper, the show seeks to depict the lives, thoughts and emotions of those incarcerated on death row. The show opens Friday, Oct. 23.(AP Photo/John Rogers)
